issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

epic.name: Mocha test failures
epic.summary: Mocha test: Address unit test failures

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Titanium.Blob constructed from File.read() please investigate the failure. Please use https://github.com/ewanharris/titanium-mobile-mocha-suite/tree/TIMOB-24816 to find the related testYou can use https://github.com/ewanharris/mocha-test to quickly debug (most) mocha tests)
fields.summary: Windows: Mocha test Titanium.Blob constructed from File.read() test failure

comments.body: Same as TIMOB-25012, this fails on iOS too. I would resolve this as "won't fix" because we take iOS as reference platform.
Closing old "Won't fix" tickets. If you disagree, please reopen.
